definition: Altai republic in Russian central Asia, capital Gorno-Altaysk
flatter
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
variant of 爾|尔[er3]
thus/so/like that/you/thou
Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1] in Shandong/abbr. for Thailand
safe/peaceful/most/grand
Altai mountain range in Xinjiang and Siberia
Altai mountain chain on the border of Russia and Mongolia
flower or herb of Heteropappus altaicus (used in TCM)/Flos seu Herba Heteropappi altaici
Altaic language
(bird species of China) Altai snowcock (Tetraogallus altaicus)

sentences.english: Again, let him get used to the fastened halter for several days.
sentences.chinese: 再次，让他习惯了被系阿尔泰了好几天。

sentences.english: The Mengku region is located at the southern foot of the Altay Mountains to the north of the Junggar basin.
sentences.chinese: 新疆蒙库地区位于阿尔泰山南麓，南接准噶尔盆地。

sentences.english: The use of Uzbek language belongs to Altaic Turkic language branch, West Huns.
sentences.chinese: 使用乌孜别克语，属阿尔泰语系突厥语族西匈奴语支。

sentences.english: Huh, you also know there are gold mines in the Altay Mountains?
sentences.chinese: 哦，你也知道阿尔泰山有金矿啊？

sentences.english: On the Altai the antler deer breeding has become widespread.
sentences.chinese: 在阿尔泰山，人们大面积地养殖这种有角的鹿。

sentences.english: Dongxiang dialect is one of Mongolian language family in Altaic.
sentences.chinese: 东乡语是阿尔泰语系蒙古亲属语言之一。

sentences.english: The Scythian Pazyryk of the Altai Mountain region were another ancient culture which employed tattoos.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔泰山脉的斯基台人也是有纹身的古文明。

sentences.english: Chapter one asserts that Althaea's tragedy is a tragedy of character.
sentences.chinese: 第一章论证阿尔泰娅的悲剧是一个性格悲剧。

sentences.english: Of or pertaining to or written in altaic.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔泰语的或与之相关的。

sentences.english: Chapter Three claims that Althaea's tragedy is a tragedy of the patriarchal power.
sentences.chinese: 第三章证明阿尔泰娅的悲剧是一个男权导致的悲剧。

sentences.english: The picture was taken in the Altai territory of Russia, right in the border regions of Kazakhstan.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片摄于与哈萨克斯坦接壤的俄罗斯阿尔泰边疆。

sentences.english: After a few days, you can fasten the halter .
sentences.chinese: 几天后，你可以法尔胜了阿尔泰。

sentences.english: The major active faults of Altai Mountains in backland of Asian continent are introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 文中介绍了位于亚洲腹地阿尔泰山地区的活动断裂。

sentences.english: The Altai Hercynian orogenic belt in northern Xinjiang has experienced two stages (regional) metamorphism.
sentences.chinese: 新疆阿尔泰海西造山带主要发育两期区域变质作用。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To analyse the chemical constituents of Heteropappus altaicus(Willd.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析植物阿尔泰狗哇花的精油成分。

sentences.english: Altai eyebrows a wrinkly, to name a son under became jie.
sentences.chinese: 阿尔泰眉头一皱，令手下叫出儿子胤杰。

definition: Altai mountain range in Xinjiang and Siberia
Kazakhstan/Kazakh ethnic group in PRC
Qobto or Kobdo, khanate of outer Mongolia
Pamir high plateau on the border between Xinjiang and Tajikistan
Altai mountain chain on the border of Russia and Mongolia
Tajik ethnic group/Tajikistan, former Soviet republic adjoining Xinjiang and Afghanistan
Khalkha, largest subgroup of Mongol people
the Ural mountains in Russia, dividing Europe from Asia
Uliastai, the Qing name for outer Mongolia
Mongolia
Kyrgyz/Kyrgyzstan
Turkestan
Tungus
Kashgar or Qeshqer (Chinese Kashi) in the west of Xinjiang near Kyrgyzstan
khanate (Mongol state)
Chahar Province (former province in North China existing from 1912-1936)
